tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "Data from device settings: information you allow us to receive through device settings you turn on, such as access to your GPS location, camera or photos.

Network and connections: information such as the name of your mobile operator or ISP, language, time zone, mobile phone number, IP address,[...]"
tosdr.case: This service collects your IP address for location use

title: This service collects your IP address for location use
